name: Add10PercentDiscount6MonthsToResidential
description: Add discount 'Add 10% Discount - 6 months' for any product available, to a Residential account, and verify the discount duration and percentage
descriptionHtml: Add discount 'Add 10% Discount - 6 months' for any product available, to a Residential account, and verify the discount duration and percentage

testStage.description: Add discount 'Add 10% Discount - 6 months' for any product available, to a Residential account, and verify the discount duration and percentage

steps.name: Check if homepage app is Configure Price Quote (CPQ)
Check if page title is Recently Viewed | Accounts | Salesforce
Price list: B2C Product Price List
locator.getByTitle('B2C Product Price List', { exact: true }).click
Check if product is on the page
Verify product is added to cart
Check total charges is 30, for charge type: Recurring Total
Wait for discount to be visible
Click DISCOUNTS tab if it's not shown
Wait for DISCOUNTS tab in cart to load
Verify discount is added to cart
Check if discount is added to cart
Reload page if discount is still not visible in cart
Reload page and click DISCOUNTS tab
Wait for DISCOUNTS tab in cart to load
expect.toBeVisible
steps.statusMessage:
Timed out 15000ms waiting for expect(locator).toBeVisible()

Expected: visible
Received: hidden
